dc_title_s: The Queen & Crescent route in connection with the railroad systems of the United States and Mexico. Local map of the Queen & Crescent route
dc_description_s: 2 maps on 1 sheet : both sides, col. ; sheet 92 x 42 cm., each map 50 x 40 or smaller.|Shows state boundaries, railroad routes, names of cities, towns, and other points of interest.|Local map covers South Central United States.|Relief shown by hachures.|Prime meridians: Greenwich & Washington, D.C.|Includes "Along the Line", a description of states on route.|Verso includes train schedules, cartouche ill. entitled: South via the beautiful Queen & Crescent ; other insigna read: Queen & Crescent Route "The Southern".|Date from verso: Sept. 7th, 1890.|Below ill. cartouche: Poole Bros. Chicago.
